p: Rahimi et al. (2018) reported the hypnotic effect of the fruit and seed extracts of Lagenaria vulgaris on pentobarbital-induced sleep in mice [ 26]. The extracts of L. vulgaris significantly increased the sleeping duration of mice at a dose of 200 mg/kg, the result revealed that the fruit and seed extracts of L. vulgaris exhibited the sleep-prolonging effect.
